response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance efficiency and productivity in your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product directly from us at a special introductory price of $18,000. This opportunity is designed to provide you with unparalleled advantages and support to maximize your investment. Let's discuss how we can make this valuable asset work for you.", "product_price": 18000}
